### UMI4Cats

![](files/UMI4Cats_logo.png){style="text-align"}

[{{< fa brands r-project >}} Bioconductor](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/UMI4Cats.html){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn-sm role="button"} [{{< fa brands github >}} Github](https://github.com/Pasquali-lab/UMI4Cats){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn-sm role="button"}

R package to analyze UMI-4C chromatin interaction data.

> [Ramos‑Rodríguez, Mireia]{.underline}, Subirana‑Granés, M., & Pasquali, L. (2021). **UMI4Cats: An R package to analyze chromatin contact profiles obtained by UMI‑4C**. *Bioinformatics*. <https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btab392>

### Islet Regulome Browser

![](files/regulome_logo.png){width="330" height="100"}

[{{< fa solid link >}} Web Tool](isletregulome.org){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn-sm role="button"} [{{< fa brands github >}} Github](https://github.com/mireia-bioinfo/PIRB_shinyApp){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn-sm role="button"}

Dynamic website that allows interactive exploration genetic and epigenetic data from islet-related cell-types and tissues.

> Mularoni, L., [Ramos‑Rodríguez, Mireia]{.underline}, & Pasquali, L. (2017). **The Pancreatic Islet Regulome Browser**. *Frontiers in Genetics*, 8(FEB), 13. <https://doi.org/10.3389/fgene.2017.00013>
